fields.value: Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS): Fall Enrollment, 1987

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Fall Enrollment survey is conducted annually by the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) as part of the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS). The survey collects student enrollment data by 11 age categories as defined by the Office for Civil Rights (OCR). There are three parts included in this survey. Part A, Enrollment Summary, provides enrollment data by total of men and women and by level and year of study of the student. Part B, Enrollment Summary of Students by Age, comprises all students enrolled for credit by level of study and by sex and age of student. Part C, Clarifying Questions, supplies information on students enrolled in remedial courses, extension divisions, and branches of schools, as well as numbers of transfer students from in-state, out of state, and other countries. There are 268,567 total records in this data file.

fields.value: Version Date: 2008-10-16Version Text: 2008-10-16Version Date: 2008-10-16Version Text: 2008-10-16 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: The metadata record has been updated, the data have been reformatted, an ICPSR codebook was created, and SPSS and Stata setup files have been added to the study.;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: According to a note on page 4 of the original record layout, there are no data for columns 1-12 of Part A (Enrollment Summary). These columns refer to the data on Race and Ethnicity.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Stata system file(s), SPSS portable file(s), Data file(s), SAS transport - XPORT engine file(s), and electronic documentation.;
